item.description:
As you are aware, the PorcFest (you can still register if you want to attend via http://www.freestatep...) is coming up in just a few weeks.

As part of the festival, there are multiple tours occurring around the state and one of them is bringing folks to the Seacoast Region of New Hampshire. The tour will be to bring them by Lake Winnipesaukee, Alton Bay, Rochester, Dover, Portsmouth, Hampton, Durham, etc., etc.

The tour is scheduled to be in Portsmouth for lunch from 12:15pm - 1:15pm at the Portsmouth Brewery. After lunch, a tour of Portsmouth will go until roughly 2:15pm.

I encourage those of you that can show up for lunch and/or the tour of Portsmouth. I'm sure that the folks visiting will have plenty of questions to go around.

A few notes regarding lunch, due to the size of the group they will not be doing individual checks (so please bring cash)


Finally, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact Todd or myself. Thanks for your support!
item.why: Have lunch and introduce yourself to some freedom and liberty folk looking to move to New Hampshire (hopefully!).
item.name: Seacoast PorcFest Bus Tour
